faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion HCM Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion HCM Training offers a comprehensive curriculum covering Global Human Resources (Core HR), Payroll, Talent Management, Recruiting, Absence Management, Time and Labor, and Compensation. For a detailed module breakdown, please refer to our course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: The training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, with each class lasting 1 hour per day to ensure an interactive and structured learning experience.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend batches. Our live sessions run Monday to Saturday to maintain consistent learning progress.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer a self-paced learning approach. However, doubt clarification sessions are not available for self-paced training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer internships based on your performance in mock evaluations, helping you gain real-world experience in Oracle Fusion HCM.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Access the Course Material After the Training Ends?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide a soft copy of the course material through Google Drive, ensuring lifetime access. You can download and refer to the materials at any time.

faqs.question: Can I Request a Demo Class Before Enrolling?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer a free demo session to help you understand the teaching methodology and course content before making a decision.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single HCM Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, our Oracle Fusion HCM training is structured as a complete course, and individual modules cannot be taken separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist with resume preparation to help you showcase your skills effectively. Our expert team will guide you in creating a professional, job-ready resume tailored to Oracle HCM roles.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, having a Laptop or Desktop is essential to access the Oracle instance and complete hands-on exercises efficiently.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites or Minimum Qualifications Required for the Oracle Fusion HCM Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required! We cover everything from the basics. However, if you have knowledge of Oracle EBS R12 or basic HR processes, it will be an added advantage. The course is open to all graduates, including those with a Degree, PG, MBA, B.Tech, etc.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes, we teach from the basics and progress to advanced concepts. This makes the Oracle Fusion HCM Online Training suitable for both freshers and experienced professionals. No prior experience is required to enroll.

faqs.question: Is the Training Updated for the Latest Oracle HCM Cloud Release?
faqs.answer: Yes, we continuously update our content to reflect the latest Oracle Cloud quarterly updates, ensuring you learn the most up-to-date features and processes.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist you in your job placement journey with mock interviews, resume building, and career guidance. We also have tie-ups with top companies like Hitachi Vantara, Evosys, NTT Data, Tech Mahindra, LTI, AAIS, FIS Global, Splash BI, Innovacx, and others.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Support for Oracle Certification?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the Oracle Fusion HCM certification process and provide sample dumps and preparation tips to help you succeed.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, daily class recordings are available through our learning portal along with module-wise soft copy materials including screenshots and navigation steps.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide the latest module-wise interview questions and conduct mock interviews to help you prepare for real interviews.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance or Application Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 6 months of instance access is provided for practice purposes. No software installation is required—practice can be done through a provided URL.

faqs.question: Can I Retake This Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once enrolled, you will receive a 1-year membership, allowing you to attend multiple batches of Oracle Fusion HCM Online Training.

faqs.question: Can I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, a Course Completion Certificate will be awarded after successfully completing the training.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, coding knowledge is not required. Oracle Fusion HCM is a functional, non-coding course.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, coding knowledge is not required. Oracle Fusion HCM is a functional, non-coding course.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we do provide one-on-one personalised training sessions upon request. Please note, the cost for one-on-one sessions will be higher than regular group training.

faqs.question: What Is the Difference Between Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) and Oracle Fusion HCM?
faqs.answer: Oracle EBS is an on-premise solution, while Fusion HCM is cloud-based. Fusion offers a more modern user interface, better scalability, and frequent updates compared to EBS.

faqs.question: What Is the Difference Between Functional and Technical Training?
faqs.answer: Functional Training focuses on HR processes, configuration, and business use cases. Technical Training covers integrations, data loading (HCM Data Loader), HCM Extracts, Fast Formulas, and BI Reports.
